TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeploymentProgressChangedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.ProgressChangedEventArgs

summary.span: 表示异步操作中报告的进度数据。

span.span: Represents progress data reported in an asynchronous operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类包含一些属性，这些属性描述 、 和事件的进度 。This class contains properties that describe progress for the , , and events. 并非此类中的每个属性都适用于每个事件。Not every property in this class applies to each event. 和 表示下载操作中的总字节数和下载操作中的总字节数，它们分别适用于所有三个事件。 and represent the total number of bytes downloaded to date and the total number of bytes in the download operation, respectively; they apply to all three events. 命名与当前事件对应的文件组 ，并 反映下载操作的当前阶段。 names the file group corresponding to the current event, and reflects the current stage of the download operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将下载名为的文件组 `HelpFiles` ，并在状态栏中显示下载进度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 此示例要求你部署一个 Windows 窗体应用程序，并且主窗体具有一个 控件和一个 名为的控件 `downloadStatus` 。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BytesCompleted As Long
public: property long BytesCompleted { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取此操作已下载的字节数。

span.span: Gets the number of bytes already downloaded by this operation.

value.span: 表示已转输数据（以字节为单位）的 。

span.span: An representing the data already transferred, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 ， 属性是指下载部署清单。For , the property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest. 对于 ，属性是指整个更新的下载进度，包括清单、程序集和数据文件。For , the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files. 对于 ，该属性是指作为命名组一部分的整个文件集的下载进度。For , the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将下载名为的文件组 `HelpFiles` ，并在状态栏中显示下载进度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 此示例要求你部署一个 Windows 窗体应用程序，并且主窗体具有一个 控件和一个 名为的控件 `downloadStatus` 。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. [!code-cpp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/cpp/form1.cpp#8)] [!code-csharp[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/CS/Form1.cs#8)] [!code-vb[ClickOnceAPI#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/ClickOnceAPI/VB/Form1.vb#8)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property BytesTotal As Long
public: property long BytesTotal { long get(); };

summary.span: 获取下载操作中的总字节数。

span.span: Gets the total number of bytes in the download operation.

value.span: 表示下载总大小（以字节为单位）的 。

span.span: An representing the total size of the download, in bytes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于 ， 属性是指下载部署清单。For , the property refers to the downloading of the deployment manifest. 对于 ，属性是指整个更新的下载进度，包括清单、程序集和数据文件。For , the property refers to the download progress of the entire update, included the manifests, assemblies, and data files. 对于 ，该属性是指作为命名组一部分的整个文件集的下载进度。For , the property refers to the download progress of the entire set of files that are part of the named group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将下载名为的文件组 `HelpFiles` ，并在状态栏中显示下载进度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 此示例要求你部署一个 Windows 窗体应用程序，并且主窗体具有一个 控件和一个 名为的控件 `downloadStatus` 。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. public: property System::String ^ Group { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取正在下载的文件组的名称。

span.span: Gets the name of the file group being downloaded.

value.span: 如果调用 导致发生该事件，则为包含该文件组名称的 ；否则为零长度字符串。

span.span: A containing the name of the file group, if the event occurred as the result of a call to ; otherwise, a zero-length string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以启动多个对的调用 并同时下载多个文件组。You can initiate multiple calls to and download multiple file groups simultaneously. 使用 确定与哪个组相对应的事件回调。Use to determine which event callbacks correspond to which group. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将下载名为的文件组 `HelpFiles` ，并在状态栏中显示下载进度。The following code example downloads a file group named `HelpFiles`, and displays download progress in a status bar. 此示例要求你部署一个 Windows 窗体应用程序，并且主窗体具有一个 控件和一个 名为的控件 `downloadStatus` 。This example requires that you deploy a Windows Forms application, and that your main form has a control, and a control named `downloadStatus`. MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property State As DeploymentProgressState

summary.span: 获取进程当前正在执行的操作。

span.span: Gets the action that the process is currently executing.

value.span: 一个 值，该值表示操作当前正在下载的一个或多个元素。

span.span: A value, stating what element or elements the operation is currently downloading.
